snippet.title: iOS/Android 「SAINT SEIYA COSMO FANTASY」 Official Trailer: Play Now!
snippet.description:
Recall the excitement of Saint Seiya on your smartphone! 

Starting with the Bronze Saints, Silver Saints and Gold Saints-A new tale is to be spun with characters from the original story.

Create a team of up to 5 saints and unleash flashy ultimate move with easy tap actions! Relive the original storyline and defeat upcoming foes!

Are you ready to let the Cosmo within you burn again?

DOWNLOAD NOW! 
https://app.adjust.com/26it2m
